brand.name: AgriHub
home.hero.title: Baga Nagaan Dhuftanii AgriHub
home.hero.subtitle: Platform keessan qonnaa haarawaa hundaaf. Milaattoota waliin dhuunfaa, qabeenya argadhaa, fi hawaasa qonnaa Itoophiyaa wajjin guddadhaa.
home.features.title: Qabiyyeewwan Murteessaa
home.features.subtitle: Wanti hunda qonnaa haarawaa keessatti milkaa'uu keessan barbaachisu.
home.features.marketplace.title: Malaqa Dhaabbataa
home.features.marketplace.text: Midhaan keessan gurguraa fi kennitoota giddu galeessaa hin qabne gurgura. Gatii sirrii hojii keessan cimaa argadhaa.
home.features.news.title: Oduu Haaraa fi Gorsa
home.features.news.text: Oduu haaraa, qilleensaa tikaa, fi expert qonnaa technique waliin haaraa tursi'a.
home.features.community.title: Hawaasa Qotee Qonnaa
home.features.community.text: Qotee qonnaa waliin dhuunfaa, gaaffi gaafadhaa, beekumsa qoodaa, fi network cimaa gargaarsa ijaaraa.
home.how.title: Eeggannoon Salphaadha
home.how.subtitle: Sadii gargaarsa salphaa keessatti network keenya makamaa.
home.how.step1.title: 1. Akkaawuntii Keessan Uumaa
home.how.step1.text: Daqiiqaa keessatti bilisa galmeessi. Waa'ee qonnaa keessanifi waan oomishatan ykn barbaaddan nu himaa.
home.how.step2.title: 2. Midhaan Galmeessi ykn Argadhu
home.how.step2.text: Midhaan keessan gurguraaf malaqa keessatti salphaan galmeessaa ykn seed, meeshaa, fi oomishaaf ilaalaa.
home.how.step3.title: 3. Dhuunfaa & Daldala
home.how.step3.text: Gurguraa fi gurgurtoota waliin dhaabbataa dhuunfaa, lojistikii qindeessaa fi daldala keessan nagaan xumuraa.
home.market.title: Haaraa Malaqa Irratti
home.market.subtitle: Midhaan gaarii fi oomisha qonnaa Itoophiyaa hunda irraa argadhu.
home.market.product1.title: Teff Midhaan Gaarii
home.market.product1.desc: Teff gaarii Gojjam naannoo irraa, injeraaf gaarii.
home.market.product2.title: Yirgacheffe Coffee Bean
home.market.product2.desc: Aduun dhoohe, organic Arabica coffee bean aroma foon aa.
home.market.product3.title: Organic Kompos Xaxxaa
home.market.product3.desc: Kompos nutrient-rich soil health fi midhaan fooyyeessuuf.
home.news.title: Oduu & Haaraa
home.news.subtitle: Qaccee haaraa fi odeeffannoo sector qonnaa Itoophiyaa.
home.news.article1.title: Technique Haaraa Bishaan Bulaa Midhaan Rift Valley Jajjabeesse
home.news.article1.desc: Qotee qonnaa system water management innovative qilleensaa jijjiiramaa dhabamsiisuu...
home.news.article2.title: Itoophiyaa Coffee Export 15% Dabalata Quarter Kana Arge
home.news.article2.desc: Report haaraa global demand guddaa specialty coffee bean Itoophiyaa...
home.news.article3.title: Meeshaa Digital AgriHub Qonnaa Akkam Gara Garummaa
home.news.article3.desc: Platform digital qotee qonnaa malaqa fi odeeffannoo waliin dhuunfaa, efficiency dabalata...
home.cta.title: Kuma Qotee Qonnaa AgriHub Wajjin Makamanii
home.cta.text: Akkaawuntii keessan bilisa amma uumaa fi midhaan keessan gurguraa, odeeffannoo murteessaa argadhaa, fi hawaasa biyyaa waliin dhuunfaa eegalaa.
footer.about.text: Qotee qonnaa, gurguraa, fi expert waliin dhuunfaa, hawaasa qonnaa cimaa fi dhabamsiisaa Itoophiyaa keessatti ijaaruuf.
market.page.title: Malaqa
market.page.subtitle: Midhaan qonnaa bitadhaa ykn gurguradhaa ykn meeshaa qonnaa kennitoota amanamaa irraa rent gochuu.
market.emptyState: Midhaan filter keessan waliin hin murna. Barbaacha ykn category sirreessuu yaali.

news.page.title: Oduu Qonnaa
news.page.subtitle: Oduu haaraa, policy, fi development qonnaa Itoophiyaa waliin haaraa tursi'a
news.article1.title: Mootummaan Subsidy Haaraa Qonnaa 2024 Aduufte
news.article1.desc: Mootummaan Itoophiyaa program subsidy comprehensive qotee qonnaa xixiqqaa seed, fertilizer, fi meeshaa gargaaruu aduute.
news.article1.author: Ministry of Agriculture
news.article2.title: Gatii Coffee Record Ol Malaqa International Geesse
news.article2.desc: Export coffee Itoophiyaa gatii global ol ka'aa fayyadu, variety Sidama fi Yirgacheffe dursan.
news.article2.author: Coffee Association Itoophiyaa
news.article3.title: Variety Teff Haaraa Drought Resistant Trial Promise Agarsiise
news.article3.desc: Researcher Institute Agricultural Research Itoophiyaa variety teff haaraa bishaan 30% gadi bu'aa barbaadu uuman.
news.article3.author: EIAR
news.article4.title: App Mobile Qotee Qonnaa Alert Qilleensa Waliin Dhuunfaa
news.article4.desc: Application mobile haaraa forecast qilleensa real-time fi alert pest qotee qonnaa 50,000 Oromia naannoo gargaara.
news.article4.author: AgriTech Today
news.article5.title: Roobni Average Ol 'Belg' Yeroo Eegama
news.article5.desc: Agenzii Meteorology Biyyaa condition gaarii 'Belg' yeroa dhiyaateef tika, maize fi sorghum midhaan mirkaneessu.
news.article5.author: NMA
